title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1961/92 of 15 July 1992 establishing the amount of Community aid for the supply to the Azores and Madeira of malt of Community origin
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1961/92  of 15 July 1992  establishing the amount of Community aid for the supply to the Azores and Madeira of malt of Community origin
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amount of the aid for the supply of products falling within CN code ex 1107 and manufactured from cereals processed in the rest of the Community shall be equal to the export refunds for those products plus ECU 3 per tonne.
The provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 1727/92 shall apply to the supply of the products referred to in Article 1 of this Regulation to the Azores and Madeira.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 179, 1. 7. 1992, p. 101. (3) OJ No L 179, 1. 7. 1992, p. 6.
